pages.text: The results of combining $(l:resources/azurite)Azurite$(/l) and the protective properties of $(l:general/pigment#blue)Blue Pigment$(/l) really sparked your interest. The material seemed to surround itself with a transparent aura, which took some effort to penetrate when you reached for the lump.$(br2)$(italic)This is going to be interesting...

pages.title: Azure Dike
pages.text: A magical aura surrounding your body, shielding you from incoming damage.$(br)Slowly, but steadily recharges up to a specific amount.$(br2)Each piece of Azure Dike Equipment increases the maximum amount of protection.

pages.title: Azure Dike Ring
pages.text: $(li)Grants you $(c_green)4$() points of $(c_blue)Azure Dike$().$(li)Slightly speeds up $(c_blue)Azure Dike$() charging.

pages.title: Azure Dike Belt
pages.text: $(li)Grants you $(c_green)6$() points of $(c_blue)Azure Dike$().$(li)Decreases $(c_blue)Azure Dike$() recovery after a hit, making it recharge quicker.

pages.title: Shieldgrasp Amulet
pages.text: Infuse it with $(l:magic/ink)Blue Ink$(/l) to increase the amount of $(c_blue)Azure Dike$() provided.$(br)While cheap at first, the required energy to press more power into this amulet increases exponentially.
